nodes.bodyText: Not a big deal, but I'd query this change..

Shouldn't this instead be a reference to com.github.dockerjava.api.command.PullImageResultCallback, which is the root-iest subclass that this class is a specialisation of?
From the perspective of someone looking at the public APIs, LoggedPullImageResultCallback doesn't exist.
@rnorth I wanted to avoid referencing 3rd party classes at all, but don't mind changing it to PullImageResultCallback :)
